name: Running out of steam
description:
Shovel coal into the furnace, create steam and use the steam to power the train.

Don’t let the steam chamber explode. Get your cargo to the other station! Don’t run out of steam! You deliver the cargo by stopping in front of the final station right before the cliff.

Pro tip: Use brakes to prevent driving off the final cliff - the objective is right next to it.

Other tips:
* Click the window if the keyboard is not responding.
* Press 'Escape' to go back to the main menu and restart.

Submission page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/39/running-out-of-steam
